name: Tortured Hearts - or, How I Saved The Universe. Again.
blurb: An epic length RPG in 2D/3D cartoon animation which satirizes game cliches. Game has every feature an RPG ever had, plus attitude.

rewards.reward: Level Aspirant --\r\nOur eternal gratitude and 5 wallpapers of your choice from the bundle designed specifically for Kickstarter.
Level 1 -- Newcomer -- Get DRM-free downloaded game, an item of your choice right out of a treasure chest when the game starts, and a letter of thanks signed by a Celestial Scribe.
Level 1+ -- Newcomer with Hope--\r\nGet all previous, plus a bundle of 10 wallpapers designed specifically for Kickstarter.
Leveling up -- Newcomer with Attitude -- Get all previous plus a tourist guide to the game world, issued by Sylfeung Adventuring, Inc., with maps and transportation description (digital).

Level 2 -- Enhanced Newcomer -- Get previous, an extra license, a magic potion you can use if you want better deals (10pct.off virtual prices for virtual, in-game goods) from NPC vendors, and another optional magic potion to give in-game bonus of additional 20 pct. XP gained over normal XP awarded, plus your own Prophecy issued by the Celestial Scribe Committee.

Level 3 -- Ultimate Newcomer -- Get all previous, another extra license, an additional spiffy item of your choice (two total), a magic potion you can use if you want to give an in-game bonus of additional 10 pct. XP gained. (30 total over normal reward) You\u2019ll have access to the closed beta testing session which means you get to help polish the final product and rant directly to the authors.

Level 4 -- Serious Contender -- Get all previous, two more extra licenses, a poster signed by the development team, another dose of magic potion you can drink to give additional 20 pct. virtual gold received as in-game only loot, and CD of the soundtrack music.

Level 4+ -- Natural Born Adventurer -- Get all previous, plus a physical badge with the TH logo and title "Natural Born Adventurer,"  and the digital version of the novel, Tortured Hearts 1 - Down a Dangerous Road (the first prequel of the present story).

Level 5 -- Seasoned Looter -- Get all previous, 4 more extra licenses, an additional starting item of your choice (3 total), a T-Shirt, and a TH logo flash drive with the game on it. Your badge now says "Seasoned Looter." Also your name will be eternalized somewhere in the game world for your own little Easter egg, and you\u2019ll be put on the special credit list.

Level 6 -- Mighty One -- Get all previous, 8 more extra licenses, another T-Shirt, and the custom pet of your choice. The pet can be anything, even a dragon, a finch or a piece of rock if you like. Your badge now says "Mighty One." Also, a hintbook in comic book format!

Level 7 -- Chosen One -- Get all previous, 16 more extra licenses, 2 additional starting items of your choice (5 total), and now your name will appear on a living creature, either as a boss monster or NPC, your choice. Your badge now says "Chosen One." Your credit list appearance is upgraded with your photo or avatar.

Level 8 -- Savior of the Universe -- Get all previous, 32 more extra licenses, 5 additional starting items of your choice (10 total), and your personalized NPC is immediately upgraded to a companion (aka henchman). Your badge now says "Savior of the Universe." You can be a major character in the sequel. And for an unforgettable treat... you can visit us anytime during July and August in our southern Arizona office.
